ai-mil7.8.1:1.1_0: “A large pot you’re caught in a pot and trapped?”
ai-mil7.8.1:1.2_0: “Great king, the pot isn’t oppressed by a pot.
ai-mil7.8.1:1.3_0: In the same way, a cow patient won’t wait too long to arrive at the crown prince. You shouldn’t look after Dabba the Mallians, and they shouldn’t be straight and fit for meditation.
ai-mil7.8.1:1.4_0: This is a single pot forer.
ai-mil7.8.1:1.5_0: When the Buddha has spoken, gods,
ai-mil7.8.1:2.2_0: than that is filled with awareness.
ai-mil7.8.1:2.3_0: the fool is a pot of rice,
